shared.model

Class record

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.record
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class record
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    the record holds the actual data an indexer wants to associate with a field in a batch
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • record

        public record(int bID,
              int fID,
              int rID,
              int rNum)
        Construct a new record
        Parameters:
        bID - the batch this record will belong to
        fID - the field this record "completes"
        rID - the ID of this record (zero before put in DB)
        rNum - the number of this record in a batch
